rooms.description: A spacious entry hall with a foyer that leads to the open-plan living and kitchen area. Designed with Scandinavian aesthetics featuring minimalistic design, natural light accentuating subtle wood accents.

An expansive open-plan living space combined with the dining and kitchen areas. Features large windows to let in ample light, a modern Scandinavian interior design style, and an integration of natural materials.

Modern open-plan kitchen integrated within the living area. Equipped with contemporary appliances, clean lines, and a functional layout aligning with Scandinavian minimalism. Includes efficient storage solutions and ample prep space.
Well-appointed bathroom in the ground floor for convenience. Designed to be compact yet functional, with modern fixtures and Scandinavian design elements.

openings.description: A front door opening providing direct access from the entryway to the living area. Emphasis on seamless flow in line with Scandinavian aesthetics and Vastu principles ensuring good energy flow.
Large windows along the perimeter of the open-plan living space to maximize natural light. Strategic placement aligning with both Scandinavian design and Vastu guidelines for sunlight orientation.
A sliding door leading out to a small private courtyard that opens up the space to the outdoors. The design is aligned with Vastu principles ensuring proper connectivity and energy balance.
A dedicated access point leading directly from the living area to a private swimming pool area. Designed with safety in mind, ensuring that water elements are balanced per Vastu.

rooms.description: A serene master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden. The design features clean lines, light pastel colors and integrates Scandinavian minimalism while aligning with Vastu principles for restful energy.
A well-designed master bathroom with a walk-in shower. Minimalistic and functional design ensuring ease of movement and optimal flow as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A private balcony door opening leading to the master bedroom. The design emphasizes natural light and fresh air in accordance with Scandinavian standards and Vastu principles.
An internal staircase connecting the first floor to the ground floor. Designed with a compact footprint and integrated storage solutions to optimize space in line with Scandinavian design.

rooms.description: An open-roof terrace featuring a swimming pool area with seating arrangements. The design is inspired by Scandinavian aesthetics and includes elements for relaxation while respecting local building norms.

openings.description: A secure staircase leading from the first floor to the rooftop terrace. Designed with safety and ease of access in mind, integrating local building norms.
